trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a socket error occurs.
A <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> is thrown by the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> and <xref:System.Net.Dns> classes when an error occurs with the network.

The default constructor for the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.%23ctor%2A> class sets the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A> property to the last operating system socket error that occurred.
For more information about socket error codes, see the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation on MSDN.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.SocketException"></xref> class with the last operating system error code.
The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.%23ctor%2A> constructor sets the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A> property to the last operating system socket error that occurred.

For more information about socket error codes, see the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/winsock/winsock/windows_sockets_error_codes_2.asp).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.SocketException"></xref> class with the specified error code.
The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.%23ctor%2A> constructor sets the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A> property to `errorCode`.
The error code that indicates the error that occurred.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.SocketException"></xref> class from the specified instances of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext"></xref> classes.
This constructor implements the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface for the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> class.

A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> instance that contains the information that is required to serialize the new <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.SocketException"></xref> instance.

A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext"></xref> that contains the source of the serialized stream that is associated with the new <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.SocketException"></xref> instance.
Gets the error code that is associated with this exception.
The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A> property contains the error code that is associated with the error that caused the exception.
The default constructor for <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> sets the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A> property to the last operating system error that occurred.
For more information about socket error codes, see the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN.
An integer error code that is associated with this exception.
Gets the error message that is associated with this exception.
A string that contains the error message.
Gets the error code that is associated with this exception.
The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.SocketErrorCode%2A> property contains the error code that is associated with the error that caused the exception.
The default constructor for <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> sets the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A> property to the last operating system error that occurred.
For more information about socket error codes, see the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN.
An integer error code that is associated with this exception.
